results.name: Ascending descending base exponent transform of sequence A000034(n) = 1 + n mod 2.
comment: A000034 = 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, ... = continued fraction for (sqrt(3)+1)/2 (cf. A040001) = base 3 digital root of n+1. In general, the ascending descending base exponent transform of any simple periodic sequence can be written as a periodic set of interleaved sequences.
